title: Computer Crashes on Start
body:
So I just downloaded the new 5.6 patch and now when I try to start the client, it takes me until the screen where you can see "play", friends online, etc and freezes my entire comp. Any suggestions as to what to do?  I've already uninstalled and re installed.

Thanks

replies.body: Not surprised considering this is an [interview from 5.4](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lnowbp88lwI&list=WL&index=113)
this has been happenning to me after every new update, reinstalling my drivers worked last patch
this has happened to me since the hot patch, last patch, and to people at the beginning of last patch

Hi The true Cr7!

This seems pretty similar to something we have been tracking already.  Can you confirm what Operating System you're running?  It should allow us to investigate a bit more into this!
I'm running windows 8, and its happening to me
Just to clarify further, are you running Windows 8, or 8.1?

I've done everything from uninstalling the game, and removing the main league file, to running compatibility tests for league. Nothing has worked. If you're going to release a patch, saying you fixed something. MAKE SURE YOU FIX IT!
I'm almost positive its 8, but even if it was 8.1. The 8.1 update has been out for awhile, and I know people that have it, and play league.

I've been having a similar issue since 5.5. My entire computer freezes for maybe 10-15 seconds, and then it's fine. But the Client won't load any of the pictures/videos. Other than that, it's perfectly functional.

Windows 7 (upgraded from Vista)

If you're running Windows 7 (not 8.1), this may be a separate crashing issue entirely.  It is also extremely odd that after your entire computer freezes, it then works perfectly fine. 

In order to get a better idea, can you reply back and attach the following two logs?

1) [Dxdiag information](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)

2) [Your most recent r3d log where you experienced the problem](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7) (You'll notice that the file name starts with the date/time and ends with r3dlog.txt)
If you can change Titles of Posts. I suggest you change this from "Crashes" to "Freezes". That said, I share your issue. I have for several days now. How long has it been an issue for you?
